dcterms:description: The TRC dataset is used to train the model via the image-text matching task. It contains four types of twitters with different text-image relations, which can be divided into relevant and irrelevant pairs.
dcterms:title: TRC dataset

dcterms:creator: Yue Wang
Jing Li
Michael R. Lyu
Irwin King
dcterms:description: This dataset includes 53,701 English tweets, each comprising a distinct text-image pair, with user-annotated hashtags serving as keyphrases.
dcterms:title: Dataset for multi-modal keyphrase generation (collected by Wang et al.)
